features: Brush slots into dustpan handle for easy storage,Easy clip handle - keeps brush & pan together for storage
Quality soft bristle - no bristle loss, non scratch
Ergonomically designed dustpan and brush set

body.description: Dustpan and Brush Set The versatile tool for tackling big messes or tidying up small ones. Easy Sweeping With a whisk-broom shape, the brush easily sweeps from above, while the dustpan's rubber lip conforms to surfaces, making sure every last bit is swept up. Non-Slip Grip The brush features a soft, non-slip handle for a comfortable grip, even if your hands are wet. Compact Storage The brush snaps into the dustpan, keeping it compact. 2-in-1 dust pan set has been ergonomically designed to make sweeping up easier. The hand brush has two different types of bristle - soft bristles for dust and smaller particles and stiffer bristles for getting into edges and corners. The dustpan handle has a moulded handgrip to make it more comfortable to hold. Made from durable plastic. Box Contains 1 x Dustpan and Brush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little set
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new small brush and dustpan set for my house. I have found that in the past it's been hard to find one that actually works well.This one works great. The brush fits well into the dustpan. There's a little hole at the top so that I can hang in on a nail in our utility closet. The handle of the brush is rounded and comfortable to hold. The dustpan actually works, it has a nice rubbery edge that fits flat against the floor. The bristles on the brush are soft enough to scoot the dirt into the dustpan, but not so hard that dirt goes flying when sweeping up - the bristles are just right.This set picked up crumbs, apple seeds, and also fine dust and dog hairs that had collected under the cabinet edge. It seems that this will work fine for all of my needs.I can recommend this set. It's a good value too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple dustpan and brush, works
reviews.reviewText: Simple dustpan and brush. Functional as expected. The plastic is somewhat flexible, so it should not break when dropped and the "rubber" edge on the front makes it easier to catch what you are trying to brush up. The brush is held into the handle by slight pressure, fine for normal holding, but would toss it around. The holes in the brush and dustpan handle do line up, so you can hang the set easily on a hook. The brush bristles are a bit stiff and I was flinging cat food initially when trying to clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size. Well Made.
reviews.reviewText: Dustpan and Brush Set,Good Grips Little Brush and Dustpan Set White/grey 1 CountThis is a well made, small brush and dustpan. I use it on my art table to get off all the chips of glass I need to throw away.PROS:- Strong Plastic- Nice size- The edge of the dustpan has a rubbery band so there's less of a lip and most of the debris brushes right into the pan.- The brush "clips" into the handle so they can be stored as a unit.- The handle has a hole so I can store this on the wall on a nail. Innovative design where the hole goes through the brush and the pan - see the photo.The brush has soft, synthetic bristles, and there are lots of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: OXO uses the tag line "Good Grips" so I assumed when I ordered this I was getting a quality OXO product. There is absolutely nothing on the item itself to indicate this is an OXO item. This dustpan arrives as is, enclosed in a cellophane bag closed with a twist tie. There are no instructions, manufacturer labels or anything else attached. The brush works as you'd expect and is comfortable in hand. But the edges of the dustpan are not sanded smooth and therefore rough, sharp and uncomfortable to handle. Given the price, misleading name, and lacking quality, I can't recommend this product. 2 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Handy, smallish ... Isn't Good Grips somebody else's brand?
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, small-sized dustpan for small spaces or small jobs, and especially important, the rubber lip sits nicely on the floor and the brush works well to get the bits nicely into the pan. Five stars.On the other hand, I have to question the Good Grips branding because that's owned by a more well-known U.S. company. Taking 2 stars away for that ...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a dustpan
reviews.reviewText: The brush works nicely for larger items to sweep up, misses some of the smaller crumbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean up on aisle 3 . . .
reviews.reviewText: Got this clean up set for the remodeled kitchen, as the contractors destroyed our current brush and dustpan. I really like how this set allows you to slide the brush into the handle of the dustpan and then hang the pair together on a hook. Our ruined dustpan and brush were a mismatched set. They are light weight, yet they feel extremely sturdy. The handle allows for a good grip and there is a rubber leading edge to the dustpan that is of course a clean edge at this time. It feels strong enough to take on sharp objects without cracking or breaking. Great set for those messy moments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy tool for the house
reviews.reviewText: This fits nicely under the sink and works great for sweeping up crumbs in the kitchen.I like the rubber lip on the dustpan because it reduces the effort of getting the last of the dirt into the dustpan. The brush is big enough to grab debris that is spread out, making cleaning up messes quicker and more efficient. Since the brush fits into the handle for storage, it doesn't take up a lot of space under the sink.
